title: A retrospective study suggests 55 days of persistence of SARS-CoV-2 during the first wave of the pandemic in Santiago de Chile
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Claudio Acuña-Castillo, Mabel Vidal, Eva Vallejos-Vidal, Roberto Luraschi, Carlos Barrera-Avalos, Ailen Inostroza-Molina, Sonia Molina-Cabrera, Daniel Valdes, Carolina Schafer, Kevin Maisey, Mónica Imarai, Rodrigo Vera, Sergio Vargas, Leonel E. Rojo, Elías Leiva-Salcedo, Alejandro Escobar, Sebastián Reyes-Cerpa, Alexis Gaete, Ricardo Palma-Vejares, Dante Travisany
